name: See You Laser 2
description:
You've seen the future of laser technology, but how did it start?

It's the 1960s and nuclear technology has begun to loom over the world, and the USA is leading the race with laser technology also on it's wake. But over on the other, cold, side of the world is our friendly neighbor Russia, who just happens to secretly be handling nuclear and laser tools of their own.

Well you play as a sentient AI laser who doesn't like war, and really is not in the mood for nuclear warfare. It aims to dismantle the plutonium inside the nuclear reactors in the lab, and evade a war that would wipe laser tech for ever!

Made Originally by :

  • Marie Wispler
  • Gereon  Plättner

Prequel-ed by:

  • Ian Klaere (Art)
  • Sagar Shrestha (Code)

For: 

University of Applied Sciences Europe 

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Games a Week"  (SummerSemester 2020)
